source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_00<tab>Ellie has the latest information on the phantom thief's target.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_00<tab>ミスリルアイの記者エリーは、冒険者に「コロセウムの秘宝」についての続報を伝えたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_01<tab>Inspector's Log:
With my plan to out the thief at Miss Arabella's wedding proving a rousing success, we were <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> close to defending the treasure from the clutches of the many-faced fiend. But even the best-laid plans of inspectors extraordinaire are wont to go awry, and our phantom quarry successfully absconded with the so-called Maiden's Virtue. With no rest for the weary agent of enquiry, I have ventured to the Coliseum to begin my preliminary search of the environs. This time, I swear on the Manderville name, the phantom thief shall meet his match!
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
Ellie believes she has identified the thief's next target: a priceless treasure set to be awarded to the winner of the Mythril Cup, a tournament scheduled to be held at the Coliseum in the coming days. She informs you that her colleague Ganelon is in Ul'dah as you speak, researching for a feature on this very event. Travel to town and see what the reporter might tell you.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
「るり色の乙女の唇を奪う」という予告からアラベラを守るべく、ヒルディブランドたちは奮闘したが、「怪盗白仮面」が盗んだのは「アーゼマの口づけ」という異名を持つ首飾りだった。またしても怪盗白仮面から送られてきた黒塗りのカードには、「勝者にあたえられしコロセウムの秘宝をいただきに参ります」という、新たな犯行予告が書かれていた。ヒルディブランドたちは、今度こそ怪盗白仮面の犯行を防ぐことができるのだろうか……？
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
エリーが調べた情報によると、予告状に記されていた「コロセウムの秘宝」は、アマジナ杯闘技会で与えられる賞品のことを指しているという。ウルダハ：ナル回廊のコロセウム前に向かい、エリーの友人であるミスリルアイの記者「ガネロン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_02<tab>With some encouragement from Ellie, Ganelon shares his findings with you. It would seem that many of the scheduled combatants for the Mythril Cup have withdrawn due to injuries sustained under curious circumstances, leading to suspicions of foul play. Speak with the gatekeeper Yuyubaya to gain entrance to the Coliseum, that you might further question the relevant parties.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_02<tab>ガネロンによると、今回のアマジナ杯闘技会は大荒れのようだ。大会の進行役からも話を聞くため、ウルダハ：ザル回廊のコロセウムの奥にいる「ユユバヤ」に話しかけ、財団の事務所の中に入ろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_03<tab>Upon arriving at the Coliseum and speaking with the organizer, one Dour Meadow, you soon reunite with a certain gentleman inspector and consulting detective, with the rivalry between the two as heated as ever. With a mind to keep the prizes out of the hands of the thief, you enter the tourney at Inspector Briardien's behest, submitting your application to the tentacled receptionist known by the name of Ultros. Fearing for your safety now that you have declared your intention to fight, Ellie suggests that you return to Ganelon and seek out more information on the shady attacks against potential combatants.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_03<tab>怪盗白仮面が狙っている賞品を守るためには、大会に出場して勝ち取るほかないようだ。大会に出場することになった冒険者とヒルディブランドだったが、優勝を狙うためには、話題の「剣闘士殺し」の対策を立てなければならない。コロセウム前の「ガネロン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_04<tab>Ganelon shares with you his suspicions that the confident gladiatrix by the name of Avila might be in some way connected to the curious incidents. He encourages you to seek out one Raging Rat, a gladiator who fell to the selfsame Avila in the preliminary rounds, that you might gain the information you need to protect yourself.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_04<tab>ガネロンによると、アヴィラと対決する予定の選手は、「剣闘士殺し」に狙われる可能性が高いらしい。実際にアヴィラと戦ったことがある選手に話を聞いてみたほうがよさそうだ。ウルダハの格闘士ギルド前にいる「レイジング・ラット」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_05<tab>Raging Rat suspects that Avila's renowned “Tempest Blade” is some sort of sorcery, while Ellie wonders if the Ala Mhigan shieldmaiden might not be being aided by one of her fellow refugees. Meanwhile, Hildibrand and Nashu have taken a harmless, if seemingly unfruitful, interest in a certain eight-legged individual. Humor him by traveling to the Coliseum and seeing where his investigation might have led.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_05<tab>レイジング・ラットによると、アヴィラの得意技である、竜巻を巻き起こすほどの剣風には仕掛けがあるという。共犯者の可能性があるとして、コロセウムまでオルトロスを探しに行った「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_06<tab>Alongside Hildibrand, you pursue the shifty Ultros about and around the Coliseum. As expected, his behavior is most curious, if not particularly enlightening. Return to the Coliseum entrance and listen to Nashu's latest musings on the movements of her quarry.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_06<tab>ヒルディブランドと共に、オルトロスの様子を覗き見たが、とくにおかしな様子はなかった。コロセウム前に向かい、オルトロスを探しに行った「ナシュ・マカラッカ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_07<tab>Your pursuit of Ultros has proven to be every bit as fruitful as expected─which is to say, not very. Perhaps Inspector Hildibrand has managed to glean something from this utterly unremarkable turn of events. Inquire with him as to what may be on his mind.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_SEQ_07<tab>ナシュ・マカラッカと共に、オルトロスの様子を覗き見たが、やはりおかしな様子はなかった。ヒルディブランドの見解を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ganelon in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_00<tab>ウルダハのガネロンと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yuyubaya in the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_01<tab>コロセウムのユユバヤと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Ganelon in front of the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_02<tab>コロセウム前のガネロンと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Raging Rat.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_03<tab>レイジング・ラットと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hildibrand in the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_04<tab>コロセウムのヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Nashu Mhakaracca in front of the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_TODO_05<tab>コロセウム前のナシュ・マカラッカと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was wondering when you'd show up. I've got the latest scoop on the “victor's spoils” that our many-faced friend has set his sights on.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_000<tab>待ってたわ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
予告状に書かれていた「コロセウムの秘宝」について、
バッチリ調査をしておいたんだから！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_001<tab>Have you visited the Coliseum of late? There's a tourney in the works, and it's looking to be a big one─the Mythril Cup, sponsored by none other than Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_001<tab>文字どおりなら、コロセウムというのはウルダハにある闘技場。
そして、次に開催されるのは、「アマジナ鉱山協会」会長、
フィルガイス氏が主催する「アマジナ杯闘技会」……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_002<tab>They say that Master Fyrgeiss will be furnishing the prizes himself from his personal collection. Small wonder it's captured the attention of Mister Stickyfingers.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_002<tab>この大会には、かなりの豪華賞品が用意されてるみたいだし、
その中に、「怪盗白仮面」が狙う「秘宝」があるとみて
間違いないでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_003<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> familiar with the Concern, yes? It's only the largest mining interest in the sultanate, after all.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_003<tab>……ああ、「アマジナ鉱山協会」っていうのは、
アマジナ鉱山社や鉱山鉄道社を束ねる鉱業グループなの。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_004<tab>The chairman, Master Fyrgeiss, sits on the Syndicate, and possesses such wealth that rumor has it he could buy half the realm if he chose to.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_004<tab>そこの会長であるフィルガイスさんは、
砂蠍衆のひとりでもある、超大金持ちよ。
彼自身、コロセウムの熱狂的なファンでもあるんですって。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_005<tab>He's also renowned for being something of a martial arts enthusiast. With his position affording him little opportunity to test his own skills, he settles for living vicariously through the exploits of others─hence his sponsorship of tournaments like the Mythril Cup.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_005<tab>……さて、私が調べたのはここまで。
詳しいことは、「ミスリルアイ」の同僚に聞いたほうが早いわ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_006<tab>My colleague Ganelon is in Ul'dah covering the tourney as we speak. If we were to track him down, I bet he'd be able to give us something to get our investigation started.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_006<tab>ウルダハで取材をしている「ガネロン」って奴が、
コロセウムの記事を主に担当しているの。
そいつに、最新情報を聞きに行きましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_010<tab>Let's make for Ul'dah, find Ganelon, and get this investigation started!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_010<tab>ガネロンなら今、ウルダハで仕事をしてるわ。
さぁ、さっそく行きましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_030<tab>Yes? I'm a busy man. If you're looking for small talk, I suggest you look elsewhere.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_030<tab>……なんだい？
俺は仕事中だ、雑談なら後にしてくれ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_031<tab>No need to be rude, Ganelon─<var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> a friend of mine. Now, what say you share your latest findings with us? I promise I'll make it worth your while.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_031<tab>まぁまぁ、そう言わずに……さ？
今度あなたが担当する特集記事、手伝ってあげるから。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_032<tab>E-Ellie!? Hmph. If it isn't the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>'s star reporter. Come to have a laugh at Ganelon's expense before returning to pen your latest front-page feature, eh?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_032<tab>ゲッ、何してんだよテメェ。
注目度1位の「怪盗白仮面特集」を担当してるエリー様が、
わざわざ俺を冷やかしにきたってか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_033<tab><sigh> Oh, very well. Just promise you'll put in a good word for me with the higher-ups, okay? Now, let me tell you this: there's strange things afoot at the Coliseum.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_033<tab>……って、そうか。
「アマジナ杯闘技会」の賞品を「怪盗白仮面」が狙ってるんだな。
ハッ、こんなに荒れ模様な大会は初めてだぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HOTCH_000_034<tab>(-???-)Bugger all! It's a travesty, I tell you!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HOTCH_000_034<tab>(-？？？？-)ちくしょう……なんでこんなことに！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_035<tab>Hotch, Hewe, and Haymo! Whatever is the matter? And where, pray tell, is Hutchin? The four of you will compete for the Cup together, yes?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_035<tab>ホッチ君にヒュー君、それにヘイモ君じゃねぇか。
……おや、ハッチン君はどうした？
確か「アマジナ杯闘技会」は、4人で参加するって言ってたよな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HEWE_000_036<tab>I fear that an unfortunate mishap has left Hutchin in no condition to fight. We were just on our way to convey the dire news to Dour Meadow.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HEWE_000_036<tab>ああ、記者さん……。
ハッチンは、大会を棄権することになった……。
俺たちは、それをダワー・メドーさんに伝えにきたんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HOTCH_000_037<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Mishap<var 1A 01 /var>, my arse─this was sabotage! Some bloody coward out there will stop at nothing to eliminate his competition. I swear it on my subligar!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HOTCH_000_037<tab>あの、「剣闘士殺し」に闇討ちされたんだ！
いったいどうして……くそっ、卑怯者め！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_038<tab>(-???-)Lower your voice, Hotch. My head stings enough without your bloody shouting.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_038<tab>(-？？？？-)……陰気臭ぇ面してんじゃねぇよ。
怪我に響くぜ、まったく。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HAYMO_000_039<tab>H-Hutchin! Sh-Should you not be resting your wounds? Oh, but forgive your incompetent, unworthy comrade! If I had been quicker with my mantra, we would still be four men strong!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HAYMO_000_039<tab>ハ、ハッチン兄さん、もう動けるのかい？
ごめんよ、俺の……俺のマントラがもう少し早ければ、
辞退なんてしなくてすんだのに……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_040<tab>Do not berate yourself so, Haymo. In victory and in defeat, the Mantravilles fight as one. You bear no more responsibility for my wounds than I.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_040<tab>フン、弟が一丁前にひとりで責任感じてんじゃねぇよ。
こいつぁ、俺たち「マントラーズ」全員の責任だ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_041<tab>Anyroad, I daresay I'll not be getting back into fighting fettle by arsing about in bed. I'm ready to chant some mantras─how about the lot of you!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_041<tab>……ずっと寝てたら、身体が鈍っちまった。
マントラの特訓したい気分だぜ。
どうだ、一緒にやるだろう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HAYMO_000_042<tab>H-Hutchin! For you, I am <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> ready!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HAYMO_000_042<tab>ハッチン兄さん……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_043<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> what I like to hear! A thousand mantras, and I want each one to ring out over the Sagolii!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HUTCHIN_000_043<tab>よし、行くぞてめえら、マントラ1000回だ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_044<tab>The...<var 1A 02 /var>Mantravilles<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_044<tab>…………え？
マ、マントラーズって本当にいたの！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_044<tab>Aye. As Hutchin tells it, they took their name from a training partner they met at the Fist of Rhalgr─a man they most admired for his devotion and chiseled physique.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_044<tab>知らねぇのか。
マントラーズのマントラは大人気だぜ。
まぁ、癒す相手がいないから、意味ないけどな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_045<tab>...Consider me not the least bit interested. This talk of attacks on the competitors, however─of this I would hear more.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_045<tab>……そ、そうなんだ。
と、ところで彼らが言っていた「剣闘士殺し」ってなに？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_046<tab>Ah, yes. I mentioned that strange things were afoot, yes? With mere days left before the Mythril Cup, a staggering number of would-be combatants have withdrawn, citing a host of curious ailments and injuries.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_046<tab>大会に参加していた闘士たちが、予選大会を前後して、
不可解な怪我や体調不良で、バンバン倒れちまってな……。
なんでも、「剣闘士殺し」が暗躍してるって噂もあるらしい。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_047<tab>With the list of entrants shrinking by the day, the organizers have been forced to abandon the elimination format in favor of a mass melee between what few battlers remain.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_047<tab>相次ぐ参加辞退で、大会のカードはめちゃくちゃ。
そのせいで、トーナメント形式だった「アマジナ杯闘技会」は、
決勝戦が、バトルロイヤル形式に変更になっちまった。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_048<tab>The phantom thief's challenge... Gladiators dropping like flies... No, this is no mere coincidence. I would speak to the individual in charge of the event. Where might I find him?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_048<tab>そんなに荒れてたのね……。
うーん、大会の進行役の人にも話を聞きたいんだけど、
どこにいるかわかるかしら？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_049<tab>Though the Concern sponsors the tourney, the day-to-day organizational duties are being handled by a fellow by the name of Dour Meadow. He should be in his office within the Coliseum's halls. I'll send word to the gateman, Yuyubaya─he owes the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> a favor or two.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_049<tab>今大会の進行役は、ベテランの「ダワー・メドー」さんだ。
コロセウム奥にある、財団の事務所にいるんじゃねぇか？
門番の「ユユバヤ」に取材だって言えば、通してくれるさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_050<tab>Splendid! Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we've got a case to crack!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_050<tab>ありがとう、行ってみるわ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_060<tab>With gladiators dropping one after the next, I've had to rewrite my Mythril Cup preview five times in the past two days. Ah, make that six...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_060<tab>荒れ模様の大会に、「怪盗白仮面」……か。
チッ、仕事が増えるなぁ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_065<tab>Let's go find this Dour Meadow and see what he can tell us about the tourney. Ganelon said we could find him in his office at the Coliseum, yes?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_065<tab>大会の進行役の人に話を聞いてみましょう。
コロセウム奥にある、財団の事務所にいるそうよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_YUYUBAYA_000_070<tab>From the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>, you say? Then by all means, you are free to enter!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_YUYUBAYA_000_070<tab>「ミスリルアイ」の記者さんと取材にきたのかい？
それじゃあ、財団の事務所に入りなよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_100<tab>I am Ellie, reporter for the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>─never blinking, all-seeing, you know the deal, yes? And you must be Dour Meadow. I was hoping I could ask you a few questions about the upcoming tourney.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_100<tab>こんにちは、経済誌「ミスリルアイ」のエリーです。
いつも担当がお世話になっています。
今回は、「怪盗白仮面」の件で取材に来ました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_101<tab>Gar har har! Who am I to argue with free publicity? And from a charmin' little thing like yerself. Ask away, me girl!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_101<tab>ガッハッハ、待っていたぜ！？
予告の件は当然知っているさ、観客も盛り上がっている！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_102<tab>That said, between the challenge from that so-called phantom thief and now these bizarre attacks targeting the fighters, our tourney's already the talk o' the town! Not that you'll see me complainin'─provided someone's still left to fight, that is.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_102<tab>「怪盗白仮面」は、世間の関心も高い。
試合の賭け金も跳ね上がって、我々としては嬉しい悲鳴だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_103<tab>Yer free to investigate as ye wish, but ye'd be smart to exercise some caution. Needless to say, recent events have everyone here a bit on edge. Why, just moments ago one fighter almost took off another's head for insultin' the color o' his subli─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_103<tab>取材も捜査も自由だが、気を付けてくれよ？
大会参加者は気が立ってるもんで、常に一触即発の雰囲気だ。
殴り合いに巻き込まれても、補償はできないぜ……っと。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_100_103<tab>Looks like we've got ourselves another...hm? These two aren't in the entry books...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_100_103<tab>……ほぉら、さっそく始まったようだ。
やれやれ、いったい、どこの剣闘士だ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_104<tab>...And our challenger unleashes a vicious right hook as the gentleman inspector was channeling his strength for his next attack. Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_104<tab>決めポーズの隙を狙っての、一発ノックアウトです～！
むむ～、これは勝負ありましたね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_105<tab>I-Inspector Briardien! As efficient as ever, I see.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_105<tab>あら……。
確かにブリアルディアン君は、いつも気が立っていたわね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_106<tab>A true gentleman...<cough>...eschews violence...<cough>...Inspector.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_106<tab>ぼ、暴力……反対……ですぞ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_107<tab>...You were thinking. It annoyed me.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_107<tab>……ああ、失礼。
ポンコツが勝手にウロウロしていたのでね、
静かにさせておいた。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_108<tab>Dour Meadow, I presume. Tell me everything you can about the prizes for this tourney. And try to be brief.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_108<tab>ダワー・メドー、貴方が責任者だな。
さっそくだが、大会の賞品について詳しく教えてくれ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_109<tab>Was wonderin' when ye might ask. Master Fyrgeiss has spared no expense in making the Mythril Cup the most lucrative tourney this Coliseum's ever seen. The victor will receive a true treasure from his collection─the Warden's Grace, a ring fitted with the largest sun sphere ye'll find outside o' Qarn.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_109<tab>おう、今回の優勝賞品は超豪華！
緋色に輝く太陽石を使った、最高級の「日神の指輪」だ！
まぁ、「怪盗白仮面」が狙うのも納得の逸品ってところだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_110<tab>The second- and third-place prizes are nothin' to sneeze at, neither. But I don't care how many faces he's got─we've nothin' to fear from this thief. The Concern has hired an elite regiment of Stone Torches to watch over the vault day an' night.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_110<tab>副賞も含め、賞品はすべて倉庫で厳重に管理中だ。
今回は、警備にアマジナ鉱山社配下の鉄灯団もついている。
品物の安全は確保されてるぜ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>Yes, just as the Brass Blades were so successful in stopping the thief last time. If you want your treasures safe, go fetch them and bring them to me. And be quick about it─I haven't all day.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>では、今大会の賞品をすべて、ぼくに預けてくれ。
敵は変装の達人……鍵番ですら信用できない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_112<tab>Fear I can't do that, Inspector. After all, what proof do I have that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> ain't mister many-faces in another of his elaborate getups?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_112<tab>……そいつはできねぇな。
だいたい、変装の達人というなら、
当のお前さんが「怪盗白仮面」ではない証拠がどこにある？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_113<tab>No, if you want to get your hands on the spoils, you'll have to claim them as any other would─in battle.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_113<tab>一等最初に賞品を手にしてぇっつーんなら……。
この「アマジナ杯闘技会」に出て、自分の力で勝ち取るんだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_100_113<tab>As a matter of fact, what with the ranks thinned as they are, we're actively recruiting new competitors. The more, the merrier─and the more lucrative, at that. Gar har har!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_100_113<tab>ちょうど、大会の決勝戦は、飛び入り参加の可能な、
バトルロイヤルに変更になったばかり……。
参加者が増えれば、観客も喜ぶってもんだ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_114<tab>Now, where did our receptionist get off to? Over here, ye slimy bugger! We've got some fresh blood for the melee!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_114<tab>おーい、受付～。
事件屋サンが参加を検討するそうだ、こっちに来な。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_115<tab>(-???-)Give me a moment, will ya? I've only got eight arms! ...Or were they legs?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_115<tab>(-？？？？-)んも～、ダワーさんってば、ヒト使い……
ならぬ、タコ使いが荒いわぁ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_116<tab>(-Slobbering Cephalopod-)Ya called? I was just about to give the lovely Miss Avila the grand tour!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_116<tab>(-紫色のタコもどき-)せっかく今、優勝候補の剣闘士「アヴィラ」ちゃんに、
事務所の案内をしとったのに～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_117<tab>I-Inspector Hildibrand, look! He's...purple!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_117<tab>ヒルディブランド様、たっ、大変です！
足がいっぱいあります～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_118<tab>Astute as ever, Nashu! This color, this overabundance of appendages...I smell a case!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_118<tab>あ、あんなにたくさん！？
こいつはもう、事件の香りしかしませんぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_119<tab>Ah, that's just my receptionist, Ultros. Don't be startled, now─he's an ugly little bugger, but he's friendly enough. Word has it he was one of many bizarre creatures born from a recent experiment with ancient incantations at the Thaumaturges' Guild.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_119<tab>ああ、そいつは「オルトロス」っつー奴だ。
呪術士ギルドが珍しい古文書を元に妖異召喚の実験をしたら、
妙な妖異が数体でてきて、その中にいたようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_120<tab>They were going to seal him away in a hole in the desert with the others, when he opened his slobberin' mouth and started pleadin' for his life. “I just want to live in peace! I'll do anything! Anything!” So the management hired him to perform odd jobs about the Coliseum.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_120<tab>呪術士の連中が封印しようとしたところを、こいつは、
「大人しくするからエオルゼアで生活したい」と食い下がってな。
結局、コロセウム財団が引き取り、下働きに雇ったってわけだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_121<tab>And am I ever glad they did! I tell ya, this job ain't glamorous, but it sure has its perks.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_121<tab>うひょひょ、かわいい女の子はオルちゃんって呼んでね～。
受付業ってのは、はじめは面倒だったけど～、
やってみるとなかなか楽しいのだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_122<tab>What a delicious morsel! I wanna get my tentacles around her...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_122<tab>アヴィラちゃんみたいな、
つおくて美人な剣闘士と、仲良くなれるもんね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_AVILA_000_123<tab>Hmph. I know not who you are or where you hail from, and I do not care. If you dare challenge me, my Tempest Blade will show you no mercy.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_AVILA_000_123<tab>……フン、事件屋だかなんだか知らないが、覚悟しておけ。
私の剣が舞い起こす竜巻で、貴様らをあの世に送ってやる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_AVILA_000_124<tab>You can forget about your case, <var 1A 02 /var>Inspector<var 1A 01 /var>. There is only one who will claim the victor's spoils, and that is me.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_AVILA_000_124<tab>優勝賞品は、怪盗にも貴様らにも渡さない。
私が勝ち取ってみせるさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_125<tab>Ooh, I just loooooove it when she talks tough. Now, who's the chump who wanted to get a pummeling by my lovely little Avi?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ORTHRUS_000_125<tab>……それで、大会に参加して、
アヴィラちゃんに倒されたいバカちんは、どこのどいつなの～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_126<tab>Though a gentleman takes far more pride in rescuing fair damsels than fighting them, I fear we have little recourse. I, Hildibrand─agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire─shall do what must be done to...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_126<tab>……フッフッフ、仕方がありません。
ここはこの私、事件屋ヒルディブランドが……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_127<tab><var 29 EB02 /var> will be entering the tournament on my behalf.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_127<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、頼めるか。
君の実力なら、優勝は確実だろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_128<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>? Ye <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> look like a <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>... Well, bugger me with a spear! To think I'd see the day when a Warrior o' Light stood in my Coliseum!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_128<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>って……
まさか、<var 29 EB02 /var>？
エオルゼア同盟軍とともに帝国を退けた、光の戦士か！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_129<tab>Hear that clink-clink-clinkin'? That's the sound o' gil pourin' into our coffers when the public finds out that a true Eorzean hero will be steppin' into the ring to fight for the Mythril Cup! Oh, and I reckon yer friend can tag along, too. Show 'em where to sign, Ulty!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_DOURMEADOW_000_129<tab>ガッハッハ、そいつは面白ぇ！
噂の英雄様が参加するっつったら、観客の財布も緩むな！
そんじゃ、事件屋と英雄様を選手登録しとこうじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_130<tab>With <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I suppose we have as good a chance as any. Now we just need to make sure that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> doesn't come down with some curious injury.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_130<tab>やれやれ……。
出場するとなれば、優勝を目指さないとね。
……例の「剣闘士殺し」に会わなければいいんだけど。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_131<tab>That gladiatrix─Avila, was it?─seemed quite certain of her chances at victory. <var 1A 02 /var>Suspiciously<var 1A 01 /var> certain, I would say.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_131<tab>先ほどの女剣士……アヴィラの異様な自信も気になる。
何か「仕掛け」がないか、調べておいたほうがいいだろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_132<tab>Haha! I am already ten steps ahead of you, Inspector! That Ultros fellow seemed most knowledgeable about Miss Avila. Come, Nashu─the investigation is afoot!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_132<tab>ええ、そうですな！
ではさっそく、あの事件性のあるタコ足を持つ、
オルちゃん殿に聞いて……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_133<tab>As much as that sounds like an <var 1A 02 /var>amazingly<var 1A 01 /var> productive line of investigation, might I suggest that our first priority is to keep <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here safe. Let us return to Ganelon and see what else he can tell us of these mysterious attacks on the combatants.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_133<tab>あんた、オルトロスが気に入ってるだけでしょ！
……いい？　コロセウムのことなら、
友人の記者「ガネロン」に聞くといいわ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_134<tab>...Very well. I shall leave that task to you. I have a lead of my own to investigate. Should you uncover any new information, I trust you will share it with me at first opportunity.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_BRIARDIEN_000_134<tab>そちらは任せた、ぼくは別方面で調査を進める。
何か重要な情報がわかったら、共有してくれ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_YUYUBAYA_000_134<tab>You must have nerves of solid steel to enter this tourney with all the ill rumors floating about. Do watch your back, will you?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_YUYUBAYA_000_134<tab>荒れ模様の大会に参加するなんて、あんたも物好きだなぁ。
噂になってる「剣闘士殺し」には気をつけろよ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_140<tab>I suppose that our questioning of Mister Ultros can wait. Let us see if this Ganelon fellow can enlighten us!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_140<tab>ガネロン殿とやらに、
「剣闘士殺し」の情報を聞いてみましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_145<tab>Look, I know you're the Warrior of Light and all, but we can't afford to take any chances. Be on your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_145<tab>あなたに優勝を勝ち取ってもらうためにも、
できる対策はしておかないとね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_160<tab>You again? I've already told you that─ What? Entered the tourney, you say? Are you out of your bleeding mind!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_160<tab>なんだよ、まだ聞きたいことがあんのか？
……って、お前らも大会にエントリーしたのかよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_161<tab>...Look. I've got a suspicion or two, which I'm happy to share with you. But in the end, you have to protect yourself, you hear?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_161<tab>それで「剣闘士殺し」について、聞きにきたってか。
チッ、情報はやるから、自分の身は自分で守れよ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_163<tab>So I've been asking around, and it seems that more than a few of the fighters who pulled out of the tourney were scheduled to fight a warrioress by the name of Avila.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_163<tab>参加を辞退するまで追い込まれている闘士たちは……
組み合せ的に、「アヴィラ」と戦う可能性が高い奴ばかりだった。
……だから大会に出るつもりなら、アイツには近づくな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_164<tab>Now, I can't make any promises, but my instincts tell me this girl is bad news. But don't take it from me when you can hear it from someone who crossed blades with her just days ago.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_164<tab>アヴィラの詳しい情報が知りたいのなら、
実際に彼女と戦った闘士にでも、話を聞いてみるんだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_165<tab>...Fellow by the name of Raging Rat. Had the misfortune of being matched up with Avila in the preliminary round, and earned himself a right bruising from it all. Last I heard, he was resting up back at the Pugilists' Guild. Why don't you pay him a visit?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_165<tab>予選大会に出た「レイジング・ラット」って奴が、
彼女に、ボロッボロのボロ雑巾みてぇに負けてるんだ。
格闘士ギルドにいるはずだ、会ってみちゃどうだい？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_175<tab>A fellow by the name of Raging Rat had the misfortune of being matched up with Avila in the preliminary round, and earned himself a proper bruising from it all. Last I heard, he was resting up back at the Pugilists' Guild. Why don't you pay him a visit?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_GANELON_000_175<tab>予選大会に出た「レイジング・ラット」って奴が、
アヴィラに、ボロッボロのボロ雑巾みてぇに負けてるんだ。
格闘士ギルドにいるはずだ、会ってみちゃどうだい？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_180<tab>Oho, the plot ever thickens! While I have my doubts that the lovely Avila is behind these dastardly incidents, it would behoove us to hear what this Raging Rat fellow has to say.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_180<tab>ガネロン殿が紹介してくれた選手に、会いに行きますぞ。
敗戦で心を傷つけているかもしれません……
できるだけ、優しく話をせねばなりませんな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_200<tab>Come to have a good laugh at ol' Raging Rat's expense, 'ave ye? Well, yer not the first. I say, is there not a man in this entire realm with an onze of sympathy!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_200<tab>ハァ……なんだよ……。
本大会に出場できなくて落ち込んでるんだ……。
俺に聞きたいことがあるなら、優しい奴にしてくれよな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_201<tab>Greetings, good sir! How fortunate you are today that your guest is Hildibrand Manderville, gentleman and inspector. Now, if you would, please enlighten me to how exactly it was that you were beaten to a bloody pulp by Miss Avila!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_201<tab>お任せください、私は紳士な事件屋ですぞ？
アヴィラ殿に、予選大会でボロッボロのボロ雑巾みたいに負けた、
ルージング・ラット殿に、ズバリ敗因を聞きたいだけです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_202<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Gentleman<var 1A 01 /var> my arse! Have ye not a whit o' delicacy!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_202<tab>おおおお、お前、気遣う気ないだろ！？
お、俺はあの女に負けたなんて思ってないからな！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_203<tab>...Never ye mind. Look, the records may say I lost, but I'll admit to nothin' o' the sort. I'll shout it at the top o' my lungs if no one else will. The girl doesn't fight fair.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_203<tab>あ、あの女は汚ぇ手を使ってるに違いねぇ。
あいつの得意技は、竜巻を巻き起こすほどの「剣風」……。
俺は、それに十分注意してたんだ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_204<tab>Tempest Blade!? Some kind o' foul sorcery, if you ask me. Mark my words: that girl is up to no good. If she weren't so damned easy on the eyes, she'd be rottin' in gaol as we speak.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_204<tab>だが、その時……俺は見たのさ。
あいつが剣を振る前に、竜巻が巻き起こったのを！！
あの「剣風」には、何か仕掛けがあるんだ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_205<tab>The girl's Ala Mhigan, or haven't ye heard? You know how it is with those refugees. Why fight with honor when ye've got nothin' to lose?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_205<tab>……アヴィラは、アラミゴの出身だ。
捨てる物が何もねぇ奴は、何だってするからな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_206<tab>Yes, and why not disparage an entire people in a pathetic attempt to salvage your sorry pride? This one's a real piece of work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let's be on our way.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_206<tab>捨てるものが何もない奴は、何だってする……？
あんた、ひどいこと言うわね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_207<tab>...I didn't mean no offense, miss. Just tellin' it like it is, as it were.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_RAZINGRAT_000_207<tab>……俺は、間違ったことは言ってねぇ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_208<tab>Perhaps it truly is some manner of sorcery, as the fellow says. Or perhaps she works with an accomplice?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_208<tab>何か、特殊な装置でも使っているんでしょうか～？
それとも、誰か共犯者がいる、とか……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_209<tab>She didn't strike me as the magic-wielding type. If I were a betting woman, I'd put my gil on the latter.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_209<tab>うーん、どちらかといえば後者じゃない？
……まぁ、勘だけど。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_210<tab>Ah, Miss Ellie! The thrill of the chase has struck a chord with you, as well! Yes, I can see it in the wrinkles beneath your eyes! We might very well make an inspectress of you yet!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_210<tab>おや、エリー殿のコジワが、
事件解決の糸口をキャッチしましたかな？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_211<tab>I'll give you a good wrinkle, you insensitive boor! ...Ahem. If what the man says is true, it's likely that her fellow Ala Mhigans might sympathize with her plight. An accomplice would hardly be out of the question.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_211<tab>コジワは関係ないでしょ！
フン、この人が言ってることが本当なら、
大掛かりな装置を用意するお金だって無いはずでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_212<tab>...Yes, I can see it now! Two unfortunate souls, shunned by those around them, united by destiny and a common desire for justice!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_212<tab>むむ、それは一理ありますな……ハッ！
私、共犯者の正体が見えてしまいました……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_213<tab>Ample appendages whirling wildly, sending gusts of wind flying every which way! Avila and Ulty─a match made in the heavens! Were it any more obvious, I could have solved this case without leaving my home!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_213<tab>ズバリ……受付のオルちゃん殿！
あの素敵な足で、大量の風を生み出してるに違いありません！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_214<tab>Incredible! Your powers of deduction never fail to amaze, Inspector!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_214<tab>さすがヒルディブランド様～！
ナシュも怪しいと思っていました～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_215<tab>What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> it with you two and that infernal octopus!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_215<tab>あんたたちは、オルトロスのこと気に入ってるだけでしょ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_216<tab>Mister Ultros should still be at the Coliseum. Let us hurry before he slithers back off to whencesoever he came!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_216<tab>では、オルちゃん殿を探してきますぞ！
きっと、コロセウムあたりにいるはずでしょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_250<tab>Shhh, friend, and look over yonder!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_250<tab>……お静かに。
むこうにオルちゃん殿がいますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_251<tab>Behold those exquisite legs! Those stylish tentacles! The unearthly undulations of his squirmy, squishy body! Yes, our friend Ulty is a most fascinating creature indeed.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_251<tab>御覧ください、あのステキなタコ足を……。
じゃなくて、あの怪しい動きを！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_252<tab>Behold how he carefully eyes the gladiatrix before him. What manner of mischief is he plotting!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_252<tab>剣闘士の女性をずっと見つめていますぞ……
次の標的を定めたのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_253<tab>He speaks! Yes, this is most suspicious indeed!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_253<tab>……話しかけています！
これは、本格的に怪しいですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_254<tab>Oho, what is this? The girl has fled in a panic!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_254<tab>………………女性が逃げていってしまいましたな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_255<tab>Our friend Ulty appears to be discouraged. Look at the way his shoulders sag! ...Or how they would sag, if he had shoulders.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_255<tab>心なしか、オルちゃん殿の肩が落ちている気がします。
……どこが肩かわかりませんが。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_256<tab>Our quarry is on the move! Quickly, Nashu─we must pursue!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_256<tab>……行ってしまいましたな。
ナシュ、後を追いますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_260<tab>Aha, there he is! You will not escape us so easily, Mister Ultros!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_260<tab>オルちゃん殿を見つけましたぞ……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_300<tab>Mister Ulty seems to have found himself another gladiatrix. What might he be plotting <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> time?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_300<tab>オルトロスさんを見つけました～！
今度は、別のお姉さんを狙っているみたいです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_301<tab>Look at those succulent legs! I reckon they'd taste just wonderful in a good marinara sauce!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_301<tab>見てください、あの美味しそうなタコ足……。
じゃなくて、危険なタコ足です～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_302<tab>Mmm...marinara sauce... Ah, he speaks!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_302<tab>……やっぱり、話しかけています～！
これは、ますます怪しいですね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_303<tab>...And another girl rushes off. Whatever did he say to her?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_303<tab>…………おやぁ、お姉さん、怒って行っちゃいましたね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_304<tab>...He looks so sad! Shall we douse him in lemon butter and put him out of his misery, Inspector? Whatever is he doing with these girls, anyway?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_304<tab>なんだか、オルトロスさんの肩が落ちている気がします。
……肩もおいしそうですね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_305<tab>Call me crazy, but I think he...likes them?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_ELLIE_000_305<tab>ねぇ、オルトロスって……
ただナンパしてるだけなんじゃないの……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_104<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_HILDIBRAND_000_104<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_106<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB401_00166_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_106<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
